blogs.title: My first blog
blogs.body:
Is this even real, is anythign real.
If you're reading this, it may not be real..you may not be real.
blogs.author: Mike Z

blogs.title: My second blog
blogs.body: I am not sure any of this is real anymore, there is no proof that reality is as it seems.
blogs.author: Mike Z

blogs.title: My third blog
blogs.body: Is it just fantasy, or are we just caught in a landslide with no escape from reality?.
blogs.author: Mike Z
